name: Shivers (itch)
description:
- What is this? Blood?!

- Ugh... I can't remember why I woke up in this bathroom...

- What is this noise? Is there someone else around here? Or... something?

Shivers is a turn-based short horror game where you must make your way through a mysterious house and all you have is a dimming flashlight... and your guts.

Controls: 

  • Arrow Keys - Turn and move the character
  • Left Ctrl - Turn On/Off the flashlight

Developed by @brunobuss, @wildgaru and @vitorlopes.w

Created for Scream Jam 2021
